page.title: 07Winterley Pool
page.content: Winterley Pool is owned by Crewe Pioneers.For adults the{fishing licence is Â£5.00 a Season,for seniors the licence is Â£3.00.Some times fishermen fish for hours.The fish you can usually catch are Carp, Tench, Bream, Pike, Perch and Roach. Winterley Pool is made up from little streams, which runs into the pool from Oakhanger.Then the water runs under the road into the mill to grind the corn.Then the water runs under the fields and road and ends up in Crewe Park Lake.The Mill stopped working about 50 years ago. Winterley Pool is about 250m long and 100m across.The kind of birds that live on Winterley Pool are Swans,Coot,Snipe,Water hens, Canadian geese and Widgeon.
